CustomField.description: Indicates whether the field stores numbers to 8 decimal places regardless of what’s specified in the field details (true) or not (false). Used to handle currencies for products that cost fractions of a cent, in large quantities. If high-scale unit pricing isn’t enabled in your organization, this field isn’t returned.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the field stores numbers to 8 decimal places regardless of what’s specified in the field details (true) or not (false). Used to handle currencies for products that cost fractions of a cent, in large quantities. If high-scale unit pricing
CustomField.label: Is High Scale Number
